title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 165.7 - Filing requirements for bridge inspection reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 165.7 - Filing requirements for bridge inspection reports

State Regulations

Reports shall be filed with the department within the time
allowed in the following table. All general and diving inspections scheduled
for a calendar year inspection cycle shall be filed no later than January 15th
of the year following the inspection calendar year. Number of Days after Completion
of

Inspection Type

Field Work

Quality Control

General Inspection
60
30

Diving Inspection
60
30

Special Inspection
60
30

In-Depth Inspection
120
30

All reports filed shall be neat, easy to read, include
original photographs or good quality photographic reproductions, and shall be
signed and dated by the individual responsible for the field inspection as well
as by a quality control engineer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
165.7

Amended

New

York State Register June 7, 2017 /Volume XXXIX, Issue 23, eff. 6/7/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
